content.raw:
From my initial testing, it is not working. I went to vrx, ran grep -r “package://vrx\_gazebo/models”, then edited each to change package://vrx\_gazebo\_models/battery… to model://battery…

roslaunch vrx\_gazebo sandisland.launch worked, but roslaunch vrx\_gazebo sandisland.launch enable\_ros\_network:=false did not
content.html:
From my initial testing, it is not working. I went to vrx, ran grep -r “package://vrx_gazebo/models”, then edited each to change package://vrx_gazebo_models/battery… to model://battery…

roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch worked, but roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch enable_ros_network:=false did not
